mapper.select:
select sp.shop_id,sp.prod_id,sp.product_name,sp.product_img, sp.price, sp.market_price, sum(op.prod_num) sellnum from shop_product sp left join order_product op on sp.prod_id = op.shop_prod_id and op.del_flag = 0 where sp.shop_id = #{shopId} and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 group by sp.prod_id
order by sellnum desc limit 16
select sp.shop_id,sp.prod_id,sp.product_name,sp.product_img,sp.price,sp.market_price from shop_product sp where sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag= 0 order by RAND() limit 8

select sp.shop_id,sp.prod_id,sp.product_name,sp.product_img,sp.price,sp.market_price from shop_product sp inner join product_glance_over pgo on sp.prod_id = pgo.prod_id and pgo.del_flag = 0 where pgo.customer_id = #{userId} and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag= 0 order by pgo.times desc limit 8

select sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_desc, sp.shop_id, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, sps.price as productPriice, sp.market_price as productMarketPrice, ps.id as skuId, ps.sku_name as skuName, sps.prod_spec_id, sps.spec_name, sps.sku_id, sps.price as spsPrice, sps.market_price as spsMarketPrice from shop_product sp left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.prod_id and sps.del_flag = 0 left join product_sku ps on ps.id = sps.sku_id and ps.del_flag = 0 where sp.id = #{id}
